sen.j: 練り(ねり)もしくはお練り（おねり）とは、祭礼の神輿や山車を神事の奉納や観衆への披露のために動かす様子のことをいう。
sen.e: Parade ((neri) or (oneri) in Japanese) is to transfer a portable shrine (carried in festivals) or a festival car (float) of rites and festivals to dedicate them to Shinto rituals or to introduce them to audience.
sen.cmt: B4およびB6は一文であると考えられるため結合し訳出しました。
sen.e: Parade (neri or oneri in Japanese) means to transfer a portable shrine (carried in festivals) or a festival car (float) of rites and festivals, to dedicate them to Shinto rituals or to introduce them to audience.

Parade (neri or oneri in Japanese) means to transfer a portable shrine (carried in festivals) or a festival car (float) of rites and festivals, to dedicate them to Shinto rituals or to introduce them to audience.

sen.j: 祭礼中の移動のときは「市中を練り廻す」「参道を練り歩く」などのような表現で用いる場合もある。
sen.e: When transferring them during the rites and festivals, it may be described as `wind through,' or `march along.'
When transferring them during the rites and festivals, it may be described as `wind through,' or `march along.'
When transferring them during the rites and festivals, it may be described as 'wind through,' or 'march along.'

sen.j: 伝統芸能において、役者等が一定の距離を関係者らと行列して歩く（あるいは船で航行する）こと。
sen.e: It also refers that performers march along (or traveling by boat) with their staff for some distance in traditional performing arts.
It also refers to performers marching along (or traveling by boat) with their staff for some distance in traditional performing arts.
It also refers to performers marching along (or traveling by boat) with their staff for some distance in traditional performing arts.

sen.j: 見物人が集まることを前提としているため、上記と同じような状態になる。
sen.e: It is based on that viewers are crowded around them; the situation would be same as previously described.
It is based on the fact that when viewers are crowded around them, the situation would be the same as previously described.
It is based on the fact that when viewers are crowded around them, the situation would be the same as previously described.

sen.j: 目的は襲名披露や公演の宣伝など。
sen.e: Its purpose is for announcement of someone's succession to his predecessor's name or advertising performance.
Its purpose is for announcement of someone's succession to his predecessor's name or advertising performance.
Its purpose is for announcement of someone's succession to his predecessor's name or advertising performance.

sen.j: この場合は、「お練り」の用法が一般的。
sen.e: In this case, the word of `oneri' (parade) is commonly used.
In this case, the word `oneri' is commonly used.
In this case, the word 'oneri' is commonly used.
